methodology.latency_basis: per-query latency_ms emitted by batch_runner predictions.jsonl

comparative.latency_regression_reason: authoritative per-query latency telemetry exists for both lanes (n=10 each)

policy_usable_envelope.cost_envelope_statement: PASS: candidate average query cost is lower than baseline (0.007125 <= 0.008766 USD/query).
policy_usable_envelope.latency_envelope_statement: FAIL: candidate latency regresses vs baseline (p50 +1516.415 ms; p95 +11201.318 ms).
policy_usable_envelope.overall_envelope_statement: FAIL: candidate is cheaper but quality and latency regressions violate promotion envelope.

limitations: Latency evidence is authoritative for this 10-query slice only.
Use with small-sample caution; rerun on larger slice for production-grade SLO confidence.
